title: Drew it, scanned it, colored it...
Woa!!!
content:
I like it... it looks like it was colored with Craypaz (oil-based chalk). I really like his pose.

-- NAJAWA --

title: Re: ...
content:
Harvey, one more time and it's a two day ban.

Dreamer, it looks really good, except his hands are abnormally large and his upper arms look funny.[url=http://spatang.com/ck][img]http://spatang.com/ck/bannersm.jpg[/img][/url] [url=http://spatang.com/cosmo][img]http://spatang.com/cosmo/bannersm.jpg[/img][/url] [url=http://spatang.com/nukem][img]http://www.spatang.com/nukem/bannersm.jpg[/img][/url] [img]http://spatang.com/scrobblersig.php[/img]

title: Well...
content:
I made his hands big on purpose, because I thought it looked kinda cool. His upper arm looks weird because his sleeve is being blown back further up the arm and the back one is being blow further away from his body.

But thanks for the compliment! [img]http://www.classicgaming.com/cc314/msgboard/emotikeen-grin.gif[/img] -Dreamer

title: Re: Well...
content:
*Somewhere on Mars...*

Vorticon: Gnaarrr!

Keen: Yikes!

Vorticon: Foolish human! Your weapon is useless!

Keen: Oh yeah? Well I have a trick up my sleeve!

Vorticon: Your pogo?

Keen: No, my arm

*slaps vorticon*

Vorticon: *smashed backwards through several walls* Aieeee!



A proud member of the signature stealing society

[img]http://img.photobucket.com/albums/v410/Gannalev/Kazz.gif[/img]

"No one should be here."
-Levellord

title: Re: Well...
content: This is yet another drawing that looks better and better each time I look at it. The colouring could either have been made neater or "scruffier" (at the moment it's somewhere in between) but otherwise very good.

title: Re: Well...
content:
[quote]Quote:[hr]I made his hands big on purpose, because I thought it looked kinda cool. His upper arm looks weird because his sleeve is being blown back further up the arm and the back one is being blow further away from his body.[hr][/quote]
That's a good idea for a picture however in your drawing this carraige is only possible if Keen broke all his arms and legs.
You should practice on that.-----------------
[img]http://jamba.nl/storage/view/335/0/cr/CrazyFrog___Axel_F_Rocket.gif[/img]
Jamster! rules!
